title: Rod of shadows
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{flavour|A rod that weaves creatures from shadows and ethereal matter.}}

Evoking the '''rod of shadows''' summons randomly selected [[shadow creatures]] into existence through the [[Weave Shadows]] spell.

Weave Shadows is similar to [[Shadow Creatures]], but instead of summoning monsters specific to your current [[branch]], it spawns monsters from a [[Dungeon]] or [[Depths]] floor. The higher your spell power, the deeper the floor.

==Strategy==
At low levels of Evocations, you'll be summoning [[goblin]]s and [[worm]]s. Don't expect much from this unless you're willing to put in the necessary training.

==History==
* The rod of shadows was removed along with all other [[rods]] in [[0.20]].
* Prior to [[0.16]], Weave Shadows could not spawn enemies from the Depths.
* The rod of shadows was introduced in [[0.14]].
